name: The tower (itch) (zeno pillan)
description:
This is a small game made with bitsy.

I made it on my mobile phone. Mostly commuting on the underground railway of Milan. 

Explore and find all the hints you need to get on top of the tower. You can’t save your progress but once you read any hint you don’t need to find it again if you started another game.

Hope you enjoy it as much as I enjoyed making it.

Best , 
Zeno.
